title: Home
cleaned_text: Get Tested COVID-19 testing is widely available. Get Vaccinated Vaccination is the most effective way to protect you and your family from COVID-19. All people aged 6+ months are eligible for vaccination. For more about vaccination in Maine, [visit our vaccine website.](http://www.maine.gov/covid19/vaccines/) Get Treatment COVID-19 treatment is available for people who are at risk for severe disease. U.S. CDC's COVID-19 Community Levels by County The U.S. CDC's COVID-19 [hospital admission levels](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/your-health/covid-by-county.html) can help individuals and communities decide which prevention actions they can take based on the latest information relevant to your county. The Maine CDC encourages Maine people, municipalities, schools, businesses, and other entities to consider the new guidance as one piece of information in a holistic approach to deciding whether masking is appropriate for them based on their risk factors.
